code: import React from'react';import{getMonthName}from'../utils/helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChartBar=_ref=>{let{data=[],title='Ventas Mensuales',barColor='bg-red-800'}=_ref;const maxVal=Math.max(...data);const labels=Array.from({length:data.length},(_,i)=>getMonthName(i+1).substring(0,3));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-2xl shadow-lg border border-gray-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-end h-48 space-x-1 sm:space-x-2",children:data.map((value,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center flex-grow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${barColor} rounded-t-md transition-all duration-500 ease-out`,style:{height:`${value/maxVal*100}%`,width:'100%'},title:`${labels[index]}: $${value}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1",children:labels[index]})]},index))})]});};export default ChartBar;
